full_summary:
### CARE HVAC Systems Renovations Phase 1
#### Tender Reference: WS3770587369-Doc3770835492

**Publication Date:** December 1, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** December 16, 2022 14:00 EST

**Tender Status:** Cancelled

**Procurement Summary:**

* The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified contractors to submit bids for the renovation of CARE HVAC systems at the Department of the Environment (ECCC) facility in Gatineau, Quebec.
* The project involves the replacement of exterior lighting fixtures and accessories, as per UNSPSC code 39111600.
* Bidding is open to Canadian companies and is conducted under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Bid Requirements:**

* Bids must be submitted electronically via CanadaBuys and Ariba Discovery.
* The closing time for bid submission has been modified to December 16, 2022, at 14:00 EST. Any bids submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive.
* All required supporting documentation must accompany the bid submission.

**Contract Information:**

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* End-User Entity: Department of the Environment (ECCC)
* Contact Information:
	+ Essa, Zobia (SPAC/PSPC)
	+ zobia.essa@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Additional Documents:**

* The official notice and tender documents can be accessed via [Ariba Discovery](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14778445?extsite=MTQ3Nzg0NDVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

The list of key points has been revised to make it more concise and easy to understand. The rewritten text includes relevant information, such as the tender reference number, publication date, and tender closing date.
